name: ripsaw.js
title: ripsaw.js - Guided Design for Non-designers
spoiler: an interactive product design environment for the web browser, aspiring to provide a minimal frustration design experience for the non-designer
an online publishing environment for developers and computational designers

name: Giraffe for Rhino
title: Giraffe - Strctural Engineering Add-on for Rhino
spoiler: an exporting plug-in for Rhinoceros 3d that integrates architectural and strutural design workflows by allowing structural models to be built exclusively within Rhino
by communicating between established software packages, it allows for a well-structured, lightweight and non-redundant storage of design data

name: pendant project
title: Pendant Project
spoiler: a design exercise that encourages a lively and expressive interaction between artwork and its frame, one that can be perceived as tension, play, harmony or competition for the viewer’s attention

name: kinetic
title: Deployable Smart Mast
spoiler: proof of concept for a structure that adapts in response to its environment
computer-aided interaction between environment and structure

name: battle
title: Battle Shell
spoiler: assembly of two shell structures floating at a distance, allowing competing performers to ‘battle’. The two units come together to form a larger roof
a computational exercise that tailors a custom particle-springs algorithm to the architectural and structural requirements of the project

name: particle-springs
title: Particle-springs experiments.
spoiler: an interactive particle-spring design tool following architectural concept
the tool regenerates the structure if their main parameters are modified
upon adjustments, it provides instant feedback on tonnage and constructability, and integrates seamlessly with other software packages used for design development
